payment due

_pRange.rdfs:comment: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.
_pRange.rdfs:label: baseSalary

_pRange.descriptionZh: 适用适用的最低消费，例如满100免运费。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.
_pRange.rdfs:label: eligibleTransactionVolume

_pRange.descriptionZh: Invoice类型实体此次需要支付的最小金额
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The minimum payment required at this time.
_pRange.rdfs:label: minimumPaymentDue

_pRange.descriptionZh: 由资产减去负债计算得到的个人净资产
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The total financial value of the person as calculated by subtracting assets from liabilities.
_pRange.rdfs:label: netWorth

_pRange.descriptionZh: 一个或多个详细的价格规格，表示单价和交货或付款费用。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.
_pRange.rdfs:label: priceSpecification

_pRange.descriptionZh: 预订服务或者购票的总价格，包含税，运费等
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.
_pRange.rdfs:label: totalPrice

_properties.descriptionZh: 报价最多可有购买多少货品，例如每客户最多可以购买一个优惠产品。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The interval and unit of measurement of ordering quantities for which the offer or price specification is valid. This allows e.g. specifying that a certain freight charge is valid only for a certain quantity.
_properties.rdfs:label: eligibleQuantity

_properties.descriptionZh: 适用适用的最低消费，例如满100免运费。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.
_properties.rdfs:label: eligibleTransactionVolume

_properties.descriptionZh: 最高价
_properties.rdfs:comment: The highest price if the price is a range.
_properties.rdfs:label: maxPrice

_properties.descriptionZh: 一个价格范围中的最低价格
_properties.rdfs:comment: The lowest price if the price is a range.
_properties.rdfs:label: minPrice

_properties.descriptionZh: 附加到价格规范及其子类型时的产品或价格组件的报价。使用指南：使用priceCurrency属性（使用ISO 4217代码，例如“USD”），而不是在值中包含不明确的符号，例如“$”。使用 '。' （Unicode'FULL STOP'（U + 002E））而不是'，'表示小数点。避免使用这些符号作为可读性分隔符。 请注意，RDFa和Microdata语法都允许使用“content =”属性来发布简单的机器可读值，以及更加人性化的格式化。使用0123456789（Unicode'DIGIT ZERO'（U + 0030）到'DIGIT NINE'（U + 0039））的值，而不是表面上类似的Unicode符号。
_properties.rdfs:comment:
The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

Usage guidelines:


Use the priceCurrency property (with standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR") instead of including ambiguous symbols such as '$' in the value.
Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
Note that both RDFa and Microdata syntax allow the use of a "content=" attribute for publishing simple machine-readable values alongside more human-friendly formatting.
Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similiar Unicode symbols.
_properties.rdfs:label: price

_properties.descriptionZh: 价格或价格分量的货币（以3个字母的ISO 4217格式），附在价格明细及其子类型上。
_properties.rdfs:comment:
The currency of the price, or a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
_properties.rdfs:label: priceCurrency

_properties.descriptionZh: 有效开始日期
_properties.rdfs:comment: The date when the item becomes valid.
_properties.rdfs:label: validFrom

_properties.descriptionZh: 有效截止日期
_properties.rdfs:comment: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.
_properties.rdfs:label: validThrough

_properties.descriptionZh: 指定价格规格中是否包含适用的增值税（VAT）
_properties.rdfs:comment: Specifies whether the applicable value-added tax (VAT) is included in the price specification or not.
_properties.rdfs:label: valueAddedTaxIncluded

_pTree.descriptionZh: 一组结构型的数据用来展示每种产品的价格。
_pTree.rdfs:comment: A structured value representing a price or price range. Typically, only the subclasses of this type are used for markup. It is recommended to use MonetaryAmount to describe independent amounts of money such as a salary, credit card limits, etc.
_pTree.rdfs:label: PriceSpecification

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的别名。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An alias for the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: alternateName

_properties.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.descriptionZh: 条目的名称
_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: name

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.descriptionZh: 两个概念等价
_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs

_sourceAck.rdfs:comment: This class is derived from the GoodRelations Vocabulary for E-Commerce, created by Martin Hepp. GoodRelations is a data model for sharing e-commerce data on the Web that can be expressed in a variety of syntaxes, including RDFa and HTML5 Microdata. More information about GoodRelations can be found at http://purl.org/goodrelations/.
_sourceAck.rdfs:label: GoodRelationsClass

descriptionZh: 一组结构型的数据用来展示每种产品的价格。

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 报价最多可有购买多少货品，例如每客户最多可以购买一个优惠产品。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The interval and unit of measurement of ordering quantities for which the offer or price specification is valid. This allows e.g. specifying that a certain freight charge is valid only for a certain quantity.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: eligibleQuantity

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 适用适用的最低消费，例如满100免运费。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: eligibleTransactionVolume

isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The highest price if the price is a range.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: maxPrice

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 一个价格范围中的最低价格
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The lowest price if the price is a range.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: minPrice

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 附加到价格规范及其子类型时的产品或价格组件的报价。使用指南：使用priceCurrency属性（使用ISO 4217代码，例如“USD”），而不是在值中包含不明确的符号，例如“$”。使用 '。' （Unicode'FULL STOP'（U + 002E））而不是'，'表示小数点。避免使用这些符号作为可读性分隔符。 请注意，RDFa和Microdata语法都允许使用“content =”属性来发布简单的机器可读值，以及更加人性化的格式化。使用0123456789（Unicode'DIGIT ZERO'（U + 0030）到'DIGIT NINE'（U + 0039））的值，而不是表面上类似的Unicode符号。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment:
The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

Usage guidelines:


Use the priceCurrency property (with standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR") instead of including ambiguous symbols such as '$' in the value.
Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
Note that both RDFa and Microdata syntax allow the use of a "content=" attribute for publishing simple machine-readable values alongside more human-friendly formatting.
Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similiar Unicode symbols.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: price

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 价格或价格分量的货币（以3个字母的ISO 4217格式），附在价格明细及其子类型上。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment:
The currency of the price, or a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: priceCurrency

isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The date when the item becomes valid.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: validFrom

isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: validThrough

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 指定价格规格中是否包含适用的增值税（VAT）
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: Specifies whether the applicable value-added tax (VAT) is included in the price specification or not.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: valueAddedTaxIncluded

isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: baseSalary

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 适用适用的最低消费，例如满100免运费。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: eligibleTransactionVolume

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: Invoice类型实体此次需要支付的最小金额
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The minimum payment required at this time.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: minimumPaymentDue

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 由资产减去负债计算得到的个人净资产
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The total financial value of the person as calculated by subtracting assets from liabilities.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: netWorth

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 一个或多个详细的价格规格，表示单价和交货或付款费用。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: priceSpecification

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 预订服务或者购票的总价格，包含税，运费等
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: totalPrice

rdfs:comment: A structured value representing a price or price range. Typically, only the subclasses of this type are used for markup. It is recommended to use MonetaryAmount to describe independent amounts of money such as a salary, credit card limits, etc.
rdfs:label: PriceSpecification
